description: Try our easy to follow Layered Tropical Fruit Breakfast Cups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Parfait,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Egg free,Back to school,Mother's Day,Father's Day,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Mango
name: Layered Tropical Fruit Breakfast Cups Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 fresh papaya, skin and seeds removed

recipeInstructions.text: Cut cheeks from mango. Remove the flesh and finely dice. Place into a bowl. Finely dice papaya and kiwifruit and add to chopped mango. Stir gently to combine.
Place 2 tbs muesli into the base of each serving glass. Top with 1/4 cup yoghurt and fruit salad. Repeat once more, topping with remaining fruit and passionfruit. Serve immediately.
